channel.title: How can people download myclient?
channel.description: okay i have a new client, how would i make my original client say "the client has been updated, go download it" i want people to be able to get the new one, btw it always has the originals sources name on it when i jar it, how would i fix that too?

item.title: How can people download myclient?
item.dc:creator: @soapeater3 soapeater3
item.description:
@soapeater3 wrote:

search for the original name in your files and change it to yours, and just post on your forums or something

Read full topic
